name: Wringle - Social Adventure Game
description:
In this game, you cannot fight the enemies but have to avoid enemies. You have to collect coins to reach to next level.

This Game is in development. Appreciate for your feedback. I am aware of most of the bugs. Besides the bug, you can suggest for the elements to be added for the improvement of this game.

Controls:

Press Up, Right or Left Arrow - To Move Player

Press M - To Display Map

Press ESC - To Pause Game

Minimum System Requirement:

RAM: 4GB

Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 820M

Hard Disk Space: 500MB

OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
